summary: Chat application with message actions implemented as a context menu (right-click on desktop, long-press on mobile) containing Reply, React, and Share options.

existing_features.title: In MessageBubble.tsx, replace the always-visible Reply, React, and Share action buttons with a context menu: on desktop, the menu opens on right-click of the message bubble; on mobile, the menu opens on long-press (touch hold ~500ms). The menu must contain exactly the same three actions — Reply, React, and Share — with identical functionality to the current buttons. No other changes to MessageBubble.tsx or any other file.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace message action buttons with a context menu (right-click desktop, long-press mobile) containing Reply, React, Share — no other changes
